title: HOLY KAPPA (New client)
body:
just downloading the open beta right now, but holy crap guys, like seriously the new update looks slick, and very smooth as its running, as i have friends that had the Alpha.
Thanks Riot and hope you keep on doing awesome stuff like this in the future

by the way, Elementalist Lux looks sick!

replies.body: It's amazing how Riot's able to blend both aspects of fantasy, sci-fi and modern styles into one. Truly amazing work.
Looks very good but why can't I resize the window?
In settings, there is a dropdown box to change the resolution of the client which will change the size depending on the res of your monitor.
yeah but where the fuck are my clubs gone lmao.

if you restart new client do you see clubs now?

http://imgur.com/a/xY4lh

Hey Maraudaur, I have a problem, my client won't finish upgrading, it gets to 9% (max) and has a connection timeout every time. How do I 'cancel' the upgrade so I can at least access the client? Every time I restart the client it automatically starts to upgrade itself with no option to stop/undo. I'm sitting on some RP that I can't wait to spend but I can't because of this.

> [{quoted}](name=1NST1NCT,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9EZP6AIO,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-11-11T02:36:44.708+0000)
>
> Hey Maraudaur, I have a problem, my client won't finish upgrading, it gets to 9% (max) and has a connection timeout every time. How do I 'cancel' the upgrade so I can at least access the client? Every time I restart the client it automatically starts to upgrade itself with no option to stop/undo. I'm sitting on some RP that I can't wait to spend but I can't because of this.

Try running as  admin, i had the same issue on the alpha client, and it wouldnt default open as admin. so maybe try that.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9EZP6AIO,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-11-11T01:04:59.115+0000)
>
> if you restart new client do you see clubs now?
> 
> http://imgur.com/a/xY4lh

yeah they're working now.
the upgrade now button is greyed out for me :(
